$comment: OSCAL Component Definition Model: JSON Schema

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Component Definition
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: A collection of component descriptions, which may optionally be grouped by capability.

uuid.title: Component Definition Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier for this component definition instance. This UUID should be changed when this document is revised.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Import Component Definition
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: Loads a component definition from another resource.

href.title: Hyperlink Reference
href.description: A link to a resource that defines a set of components and/or capabilities to import into this collection.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Component
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

uuid.title: Component Identifier
uuid.description: The unique identifier for the component.

type.title: Component Type
type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

title.title: Component Title
title.description: A human readable name for the component.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: A summary of the technological or business purpose of the component.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Capability
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: A grouping of other components and/or capabilities.

uuid.title: Capability Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for a capability.

component-uuid.title: Component Reference
component-uuid.description: A reference to a component by its identifier

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Control Implementation Set
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: Defines how the component or capability supports a set of controls.

uuid.title: Control Implementation Set Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for the set of implemented controls.

source.title: Source Resource Reference
source.description: A reference to an OSCAL catalog or profile providing the referenced control or subcontrol definition.

description.title: Control Implementation Description
description.description: A description of how the specified set of controls are implemented for the containing component or capability.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Control Implementation
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: Describes how the containing component or capability implements an individual control.

uuid.title: Control Implementation Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier for a specific control implementation.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control with a corresponding id value.

description.title: Control Implementation Description
description.description: A description of how the specified control is implemented for the containing component or capability.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.title: Control Statement Implementation
oscal-component-definition-oscal-compone.description: Identifies which statements within a control are addressed.

statement-id.title: Control Statement Reference
statement-id.description: A reference to a control statement by its identifier

uuid.title: Control Statement Reference Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this control statement entry elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

description.title: Statement Implementation Description
description.description: A summary of how the containing control statement is implemented by the component or capability.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Component
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

uuid.title: Component Identifier
uuid.description: The unique identifier for the component.

type.title: Component Type
type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

title.title: Component Title
title.description: A human readable name for the system component.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: A summary of the technological or business purpose of the component.

status.title: Status
status.description: Describes the operational status of the system component.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Service Protocol Information
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Information about the protocol used to provide a service.

uuid.title: Service Protocol Information Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this service protocol entry elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

name.title: Protocol Name
name.description: The common name of the protocol, which should be the appropriate "service name" from the IANA Service Name and Transport Protocol Port Number Registry.

title.title: Protocol Title
title.description: A human readable name for the protocol (e.g., Transport Layer Security).

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Port Range
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Where applicable this is the IPv4 port range on which the service operates.

start.title: Start
start.description: Indicates the starting port number in a port range

end.title: End
end.description: Indicates the ending port number in a port range

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Implementation Status
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Indicates the degree to which the a given control is implemented.

state.title: Implementation State
state.description: Identifies the implementation status of the control or control objective.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: System User
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: A type of user that interacts with the system based on an associated role.

uuid.title: User Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: The unique identifier for the user class.

title.title: User Title
title.description: A name given to the user, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

short-name.title: User Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the user.

description.title: User Description
description.description: A summary of the user's purpose within the system.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Privilege
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Identifies a specific system privilege held by the user, along with an associated description and/or rationale for the privilege.

title.title: Privilege Title
title.description: A human readable name for the privilege.

description.title: Privilege Description
description.description: A summary of the privilege's purpose within the system.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Functions Performed
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Describes a function performed for a given authorized privilege by this user class.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Inventory Item
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: A single managed inventory item within the system.

uuid.title: Inventory Item Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this inventory item entry elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

description.title: Inventory Item Description
description.description: A summary of the inventory item stating its purpose within the system.

items.title: Implemented Component
items.description: The set of components that are implemented in a given system inventory item.

component-uuid.title: Component Universally Unique Identifier Reference
component-uuid.description: A reference to a component that is implemented as part of an inventory item.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: Set Parameter Value
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: Identifies the parameter that will be set by the enclosed value.

param-id.title: Parameter ID
param-id.description: A reference to a parameter within a control, who's catalog has been imported into the current implementation context.

items.title: Parameter Value
items.description: A parameter value or set of values.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.title: System Identification
oscal-component-definition-oscal-impleme.description: A unique identifier for the system described by this system security plan.

identifier-type.title: Identification System Type
identifier-type.description: Identifies the identification system from which the provided identifier was assigned.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Publication metadata
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Revision History Entry
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: An entry in a sequential list of revisions to the containing document in reverse chronological order (i.e., most recent previous revision first).

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document revision, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Location
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A location, with associated metadata that can be referenced.

uuid.title: Location Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier that can be used to reference this defined location elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given location across revisions of the document.

title.title: Location Title
title.description: A name given to the location, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

items.title: Location URL
items.description: The uniform resource locator (URL) for a web site or Internet presence associated with the location.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Location Reference
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: References a location defined in metadata.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Party (organization or person)
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A responsible entity which is either a person or an organization.

uuid.title: Party Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier that can be used to reference this defined location elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given party across revisions of the document.

type.title: Party Type
type.description: A category describing the kind of party the object describes.

name.title: Party Name
name.description: The full name of the party. This is typically the legal name associated with the party.

short-name.title: Party Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the party.

items.title: Party External Identifier
items.description: An identifier for a person or organization using a designated scheme. e.g. an Open Researcher and Contributor ID (ORCID)

scheme.title: External Identifier Schema
scheme.description: Indicates the type of external identifier.

items.title: Organizational Affiliation
items.description: Identifies that the party object is a member of the organization associated with the provided UUID.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Party Reference
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: References a party defined in metadata.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Role
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: Defines a function assumed or expected to be assumed by a party in a specific situation.

id.title: Role Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific role instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same role across minor revisions of the document.

title.title: Role Title
title.description: A name given to the role, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

short-name.title: Role Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the role.

description.title: Role Description
description.description: A summary of the role's purpose and associated responsibilities.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Role Identifier Reference
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A reference to the roles served by the user.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Back matter
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A collection of resources, which may be included directly or by reference.

items.title: Resource
items.description: A resource associated with content in the containing document. A resource may be directly included in the document base64 encoded or may point to one or more equivalent internet resources.

uuid.title: Resource Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this defined resource elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

title.title: Resource Title
title.description: A name given to the resource, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

description.title: Resource Description
description.description: A short summary of the resource used to indicate the purpose of the resource.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A citation consisting of end note text and optional structured bibliographic data.

items.title: Resource link
items.description: A pointer to an external resource with an optional hash for verification and change detection.

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URI reference to a resource.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

base64.title: Base64
base64.description: The Base64 alphabet in RFC 2045 - aligned with XSD.

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Property
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: An attribute, characteristic, or quality of the containing object expressed as a namespace qualified name/value pair. The value of a property is a simple scalar value, which may be expressed as a list of values.

name.title: Property Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies a specific attribute, characteristic, or quality of the property's containing object.

uuid.title: Property Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A unique identifier that can be used to reference this property elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistently used for a given location across revisions of the document.

ns.title: Property Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the property's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

value.title: Property Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the attribute, characteristic, or quality.

class.title: Property Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the property's name. This can be used to further distinguish or discriminate between the semantics of multiple properties of the same object with the same name and ns.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Link
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to a resource.

rel.title: Relation
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

text.title: Link Text
text.description: A textual label to associate with the link, which may be used for presentation in a tool.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Responsible Party
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role in the context of the containing object.

role-id.title: Responsible Role
role-id.description: The role that the party is responsible for.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Responsible Role
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A reference to one or more roles with responsibility for performing a function relative to the containing object.

role-id.title: Responsible Role ID
role-id.description: The role that is responsible for the business function.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Hash
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a specified hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Remarks
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: Additional commentary on the containing object.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Publication Timestamp
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: The date and time the document was published. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Last Modified Timestamp
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: The date and time the document was last modified. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Document Version
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A string used to distinguish the current version of the document from other previous (and future) versions.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: OSCAL version
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: The OSCAL model version the document was authored against.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Email Address
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: An email address as defined by RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Telephone Number
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: Contact number by telephone.

type.title: type flag
type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Address
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A postal address for the location.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for the mailing address.

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

country.title: Country Code
country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the mailing address.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Address line
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A single line of an address.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.title: Document Identifier
oscal-component-definition-oscal-metadat.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier scheme. A document identifier provides a globally unique identifier for a group of documents that are to be treated as different versions of the same document. If this element does not appear, or if the value of this element is empty, the value of "document-id" is equal to the value of the "uuid" flag of the top-level root element.

scheme.title: Document Identification Scheme
scheme.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier using a URI. If the scheme is not provided the value of the element will be interpreted as a string of characters.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.title: Part
oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.description: A partition of a control's definition or a child of another part.

id.title: Part Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific part instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same part across minor revisions of the document.

name.title: Part Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies the part's semantic type.

ns.title: Part Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the part's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

class.title: Part Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the part's name. This can be used to further distinguish or discriminate between the semantics of multiple parts of the same control with the same name and ns.

title.title: Part Title
title.description: A name given to the part, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

prose.title: Part Text
prose.description: Permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.title: Parameter
oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.description: Parameters provide a mechanism for the dynamic assignment of value(s) in a control.

id.title: Parameter Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific parameter instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same parameter across minor revisions of the document.

class.title: Parameter Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a characterization of the parameter.

label.title: Parameter Label
label.description: A short, placeholder name for the parameter, which can be used as a substitute for a value if no value is assigned.

usage.title: Parameter Usage Description
usage.description: Describes the purpose and use of a parameter

oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.title: Constraint
oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.description: A formal or informal expression of a constraint or test

description.title: Constraint Description
description.description: A textual summary of the constraint to be applied.

items.title: Constraint Test
items.description: A test expression which is expected to be evaluated by a tool.

expression.title: Constraint test
expression.description: A formal (executable) expression of a constraint

oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.title: Guideline
oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.description: A prose statement that provides a recommendation for the use of a parameter.

prose.title: Guideline Text
prose.description: Prose permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.title: Parameter Value
oscal-component-definition-oscal-catalog.description: A parameter value or set of values.

how-many.title: Parameter Cardinality
how-many.description: Describes the number of selections that must occur. Without this setting, only one value should be assumed to be permitted.

items.title: Choice
items.description: A value selection among several such options
